comment: Benchmarks for Crossref Agents. First draft version.

benchmarks.name: agent-hypothesis-scan-complete
benchmarks.description: Hypothes.is Agent completes a scan the Hypothes.is API.
benchmarks.comment: Hypothes.is should complete a scan at least once a day.

benchmarks.name: agent-newsfeed-scan-complete
benchmarks.description: Newsfeed Agent completes a scan of all feeds.
benchmarks.comment: Newsfeed Agent should complete a scan at least once a day.

benchmarks.name: agent-reddit-scan-complete
benchmarks.description: Reddit Agent completes a scan of all domains.
benchmarks.comment: Reddit Agent should complete a scan at least once a day.

benchmarks.name: agent-reddit-links-scan-complete
benchmarks.description: Reddit Links Agent completes a scan of subreddits.
benchmarks.comment: Reddit Links Agent should complete a scan at least once a day.

benchmarks.name: agent-stack-exchange-scan-selected-complete
benchmarks.description: StackExchange Agent completes a scan of selected StackExchange sites.
benchmarks.comment: StackExchange Agent should complete a scan of selecte sites at least once every 30 days.

benchmarks.name: agent-stack-exchange-scan-all-complete
benchmarks.description: StackExchange Agent completes a scan of all StackExchange sites.
benchmarks.comment: StackExchange Agent should complete a scan of all sites at least once every 30 days.

benchmarks.name: agent-twitter-send-batch
benchmarks.description: Twitter Agent sends a batch of Tweets.
benchmarks.comment: Twitter Agent should send a batch of tweets at least once a minute.

benchmarks.name: agent-twitter-refresh
benchmarks.description: Twitter Agent refreshes rules with Gnip API.
benchmarks.comment: Twitter Agent should refresh the rules at least once every 30 days.

benchmarks.name: agent-wikipedia-send-batch
benchmarks.description: Wikipedia Agent sends a batch of Wikipeda edits.
benchmarks.comment: Wikipedia Agent should send a batch of edits at least once every five minutes.

benchmarks.name: agent-wordpressdotcom-scan-complete
benchmarks.description: Wordpress.com Agent completes a scan of domains.
benchmarks.comment: StackExchange Agent should complete a scan of selecte sites at least once a day

benchmarks.name: agent-f1000-scan-complete
benchmarks.description: F1000 Agent completes a scan of the F1000 data dump.
benchmarks.comment: F1000 Agent should complete a scan at least once every 30 days.
